title: Enhancing E-Learning Competencies: Language MOOC Quality Management Masterclass

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can understand and apply the MOOC Quality Assessment Model (MOOC Quality Project, OpenupEd standards) in practical settings
Learners can describe three or more content design criteria reflecting the unique characteristics of Language MOOCs (LMOOCs)
Learners can design effective mobile learning assessments in low-tech environments
Learners can develop course improvement strategies through non-completion rate analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
